column3: Re-triggered travis after merging #8324\nOk, passes locally, and in travis as well. WIP tag can go?\n

Don't consider this pull a blocker for rc1. It should test the regression well enough for now but there might be things to improve and work on later. You can merge it now or leave it for later. I shouldn't matter too much, maybe flip a coin?\n
Right - going to remove this from the milestone, I don't think we should re-enable a `-salvagewallet` test as long as we have #7463.\n
What is blocking this? It seems #7463 is still open.
Yes, I think this is still relevant. I will put it on my list for 0.15. It seems that I need to catch up with the recent hdwallet changes first. Closing for now.
this conflicts with the above comment\n
This is on purpose. Not sure how to proceed.\n
